10 PRINT "Larson Scanner"
20 POKE 24576, 1
30 GOSUB 1000
40 POKE 24576, 2
50 GOSUB 1000
60 POKE 24576, 4
70 GOSUB 1000
80 POKE 24576, 8
90 GOSUB 1000
100 POKE 24576, 16
110 GOSUB 1000
120 POKE 24576, 32
130 GOSUB 1000
140 POKE 24576, 64
150 GOSUB 1000
160 POKE 24576, 128
170 GOSUB 1000
180 POKE 24576, 64
190 GOSUB 1000
200 POKE 24576, 32
210 GOSUB 1000
220 POKE 24576, 16
230 GOSUB 1000
240 POKE 24576, 8
250 GOSUB 1000
260 POKE 24576, 4
270 GOSUB 1000
280 POKE 24576, 2
290 GOSUB 1000
300 GOTO 20
1000 FOR I = 1 TO 75
1010 NEXT I
1020 RETURN
